as I might have died an hour ago. And is it worth tormenting oneself, when one has only a moment of life in comparison with eternity?" 
But at the moment when he imagined him- self calmed by such reflections, she suddenly came into his mind as she was at the moments when he had most strongly expressed his in- sincere love for her, and he felt the blood rush to his heart and had again to get up and move about and break and tear whatever came to his hand.
